tool_description: Retrieves historical market data (OHLCV) for specified financial instruments from various data sources with configurable frequency and date ranges.

ticker_symbols.description: List of ticker symbols to fetch data for

start_date.description: Start date for data collection in ISO 8601 format

end_date.description: End date for data collection in ISO 8601 format

error_messages: Invalid date range: start_date must be earlier than end_date and both must be valid ISO 8601 dates
Unsupported ticker symbol: One or more ticker symbols are not recognized by the data source
Data source unavailable: The specified data source is not accessible or requires authentication
Rate limit exceeded: Too many requests to data source, retry after delay
usage: Provide ticker symbols array and date range. Optionally specify frequency and data source. Returns OHLCV data for all requested symbols.

data_points.description: Total number of data points retrieved

timestamps.description: Array of timestamp strings for the data points

status.description: Success status of the data fetch operation
